articles.title: Agreement Inked on Establishing Friendly Relations between Universities of DPRK, China
articles.content:
Agreement Inked on Establishing Friendly Relations between Universities of DPRK, China
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts and Beijing Film Institute adopted an agreement on establishing friendly relations. 
					The rectors of the two universities inked the agreement in Beijing on Monday.

articles.title: WPK Secretary Meets German Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
WPK Secretary Meets German Ambassador to DPRK
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Tuesday met and had a talk with German Ambassador to the DPRK Gerhard Thiedemann, who paid a farewell call on him.

articles.title: Greetings to Croatian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Croatian President
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Ivo Josipovic, president of Croatia, on the occasion of its national day.
					The message wished the president and people of Croatia success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of People's Security Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of People's Security Back Home
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK headed by Councilor and Department Director Ri Song Chol returned home Tuesday after visiting African countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to O Tok Gil, a centenarian who lives in Sinyang-dong, Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province.
					The old woman expressed in excitement her thanks to Kim Jong Un for sending the spread, saying: "The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, thank you very much".
					
					She was born as a member of the ruined nation. She was subject to the slavery under the colonial rule by the U.S. imperialists who occupied south Korea after the liberation of Korea.
					
					She has lived a happy life since she came over to the embrace of President Kim Il Sung during the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					She made all efforts for decades for society and the collective in order to repay the loving care shown by the party and the leader, and volunteers to spruce up the home and village.
					
					She has balanced diet, loves fruits and leads an optimistic life, singing songs.
					
					She usually asks her children to do more things for the country, saying that she owes her longevity to the most advantageous socialist system in the world.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Surveys of Major Construction Projects
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Surveys of Major Construction Projects
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, made field surveys of the construction of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Mirim Riding Club and the Munsu Wading Pool.
					He went round the construction sites to encourage soldier-builders.
					
					He underlined the need to set high goals to successfully construct all structures as planned and intended by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un and wind up the projects in the shortest possible time by making great innovations and leaping progress.
					
					He called for ensuring the quality of the structures on the highest level and thus discharging the mission and duty of the revolutionary army, which brings happiness to the people. 
					
					After learning about the living conditions of service personnel, he called upon all the commanding officers to take warm care of them as their elder brothers and sisters would do.

articles.title: Title of DPRK Hero Posthumously Awarded to Former War Writer
articles.content:
Title of DPRK Hero Posthumously Awarded to Former War Writer
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The title of the DPRK Hero was posthumously awarded to Kim Sa Ryang, former war writer.
					After the liberation of Korea, he conducted a revolutionary and patriotic literary work under the care of President Kim Il Sung. During the Fatherland Liberation War, he worked as a war writer. When he was surrounded by enemy troops while fighting at a guerrilla unit on Mt. Jiri., he died a heroic death together with his comrades by exploding a bundle of hand grenades with shouts of "Long Live General Kim Il Sung!" 
					
					Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un learned about his struggle and made sure that the title of the DPRK hero, the highest honor for a citizen, was posthumously awarded to Kim Sa Ryang and he leads an eternal life with the 60th anniversary of the war victory as an occasion.
					
					An awarding ceremony took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Prove Successful in AWC
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Prove Successful in AWC
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifters continue to prove successful in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					On June 23, Ryo Un Hui lifted 118kg in snatch and 145 kg in clean-and-jerk in women's 69 kg category, coming first place in both events. She placed first in total points, bagging three gold medals.
					
					Rim Jong Sim placed second in snatch and clean-and-jerk in women's 69 kg category, coming second in both events. She finished second in total points, winning three silver medals.
					
					DPRK players top the list of countries in the number of gold and other medals in the championship.

articles.title: Pyongyang City Mass Rally Held on Day of Anti-U.S Struggle
articles.content:
Pyongyang City Mass Rally Held on Day of Anti-U.S Struggle
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang City mass rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Tuesday, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism. 
					Attending the rally were senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, and other citizens, youth and students. Overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front were present there.
					
					Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and foreign guests.
					
					Speeches were made at the rally.
					
					Speakers said that the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean War for the sinister purpose of stifling the DPRK and dominating the world, adding that they hurled into it huge armed forces for aggression, the south Korean puppet army and troops of their fifteen satellite countries, reducing everything of this land to ashes and committing the most barbaric and inhumane crimes in the world history of wars. 
					
					They went on:
					
					The U.S. imperialists, however, suffered a disgraceful defeat in face of the army and people of the DPRK who turned out to honorably defend the freedom and independence of the country, sovereignty of the nation and gains of the revolution under the outstanding leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists, far from drawing a due lesson from the ignominious defeat it sustained in the last Korean War, have persistently pursued their hostile policy towards the DPRK and stepped up the moves for a war against it for the last several decades, gravely threatening its sovereignty and supreme interests. 
					
					The history and situation go to prove that the U.S. imperialists were provokers of the Korean War and are the root cause of all the misfortunes and sufferings of the Korean nation and that they are the sworn enemy of the Koreans. 
					
					The speakers called for resolutely smashing the reckless war moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group against the DPRK and achieving a final victory in the all-out confrontation with the U.S. and the drive for building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					The rally was followed by a mammoth anti-U.S. demonstration.

articles.title: Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra
articles.content:
Concert Given by Unhasu Orchestra
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu Orchestra gave a concert at the People's Theater on Tuesday.
					Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, labor innovators of industrial establishments and people from all walks of life, youth and students in Pyongyang.
					
					The concert started with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were such numbers as female solo and female pangchang "Fly High, Doves", mixed grand chorus "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic" and children's chorus "Our Beautiful Country."
					
					The performers truthfully represented the happy life of the Korean people who enjoyed a dignified and worthwhile life as masters of the new country liberated by the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
					
					They sang high praises of the feats performed by the heroic soldiers in the 1950s.
					
					Story-telling and orchestra "Nukes and Peace" reflected the will of all servicepersons and people to guarantee the dignity of the nation and the independent prosperity of the country true to the party's new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					The concert ended with female solo and mixed grand chorus "Peace Is Guaranteed by Our Arms". It was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Youth, Students Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Aggressors
articles.content:
Youth, Students Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Aggressors
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A meeting of youth and students to vow to take revenge upon the U.S. aggressors was held at the Compound of the National House of Class Education Tuesday on Tuesday, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers said that the U.S. imperialists savagely destroyed cities, villages, factories, farming and fishing villages, schools, etc. in the DPRK, killing innocent people at random during the past Korean war.
					
					The servicepersons and people of the DPRK, rallied close around the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, turned out as one in the sacred war to defend the freedom and independence of the country and shattered to smithereens the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness", fully demonstrating the spirit of heroic Korea, they noted, and went on:
					
					The U.S. imperialists remain unchanged in their aggressive nature. The enemies have staged madcap war exercises for invading the DPRK after introducing nuclear war means of various types to the Korean Peninsula and waters off it, pushing the situation to the brink of a war. 
					
					The socialist homeland is like an impregnable fortress as long as it is led by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and there are the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army and the Songun young vanguard fully ready to take revenge on the U.S. imperialists and class enemies.
					
					The reporter and speakers called on the youth to get united as one behind Kim Jong Un to achieve a final victory in the all-out action against the U.S. and successfully carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation.
					
					Ringing out at the meeting were such slogans as "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Un!", "Let us carry out the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il's instructions for national reunification!"
					
					Present at the meeting were officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Service Personnel Vow to Take Thousand-fold Revenge on U.S., Class Enemies
articles.content:
Service Personnel Vow to Take Thousand-fold Revenge on U.S., Class Enemies
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) held a meeting to vow to take a thousand-fold revenge on the U.S. imperialists and class enemies before the tombs of 400 mothers and 102 children at the Sinchon Museum in South Hwanghae Province on Tuesday.
					Present there were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, service personnel of the Ground, Navy and Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA and students of revolutionary schools.
					
					The participants laid bouquets before the tombs and paid silent tribute to the dead.
					
					Service personnel dealt with the bitter grudge against U.S. imperialists who killed innocent people.
					
					The lecturer of the museum who narrowly escaped death at a powder magazine in Pamnamu (chestnut) Village 63 years ago laid bare the atrocities committed by the enemies, saying that he could not sleep still when thinking of the shuddering massacre at that time.
					
					Service personnel expressed surging resentment and hatred for the aggressors and murderers who killed innocent people and even babies in the most cruel and barbarous manner.
					
					They noted that the bitter cries made by those massacred in Sinchon teach the truth that one should mercilessly wipe out the U.S. imperialists and class enemies, not harboring even a slight illusion about them.
					
					They renewed the belief that the Paektusan army fully ready to devotedly defend the leader will bring July 27, the day of eternal victory, in the sacred war for national reunification.
					
					At the end of the meeting the participants went round the museum.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Hungnam Port in South Hamgyong Province on Tuesday to mark the beginning of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					The speakers said that the U.S. imperialists who stretched out their dark tentacles of aggression to Korea as early as a hundred odd years ago illegally occupied south Korea, ignited a war of aggression against the DPRK on June 25, 1950 and imposed untold misfortune and sufferings on the Korean people.
					
					The army and the people of the DPRK, rallied close around the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader, waged a heroic struggle and resolutely beat back the armed invasion by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, the speakers said, adding:
					
					The DPRK inflicted shameful defeat on the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world and achieved the shining victory, a result of the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander and outstanding strategist.
					
					The speakers expressed belief that the Korean people will reunify the country and achieve success in building a thriving socialist nation under the Songun leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, holding in high esteem Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il forever.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					Present there were captains and crewmen of a Panamanian-flagged ship and a Kiribati-flagged ship.

articles.title: Korean War Unleashed by U.S.
articles.content:
Korean War Unleashed by U.S.
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Korean war that broke out on June 25, 1950 was a continuation of the U.S. aggression policy for world supremacy.
					The U.S. had long regarded Korea as a springboard in realizing its scheme to turn the Pacific into a "lake of the U.S."
					
					In March 1943, U.S. President Roosevelt asserted that Korea should be put under trusteeship, saying that it should be a free, independent country in due course.
					
					Douglas MacArthur, commander of the U.S. Far East forces, said that by occupying all of Korea the U.S. would be able to control the whole region between Vladivostok and Singapore, and that nothing would then be beyond the reach of the U.S. power.
					
					Modern History of America reads in part that virtually the war made by Wall Street against the Korean people started in September 1945, the time when its generals set foot in south Korea. It shows that the U.S. set a Korean war as its national policy and started it by occupying south Korea.
					
					In fact, the U.S. occupied the southern half of Korea militarily in September 1945, a prelude to the Korean war, and since then it had stepped up war preparations for occupying its northern half. 
					
					It proclaimed military rule in south Korea, cobbled together puppet armed forces and expanded them stage by stage with a view to a 10 to 1 superiority over the DPRK.
					
					It dispatched a Military Advisory Group to give south Korean troops American-style military education and training, provided military aid to the tune of one billion U.S. dollars, huge weaponry and munitions and, further, seized the command over the south Korean puppet army.
					
					On October 17, 1949, Syngman Rhee said the south Korean army was registering success in military training and, therefore, it was able to occupy Pyongyang in three days.
					
					Alongside this, the U.S. set up the Far East Command that would play the leading role in the Korean war and stepped up the plan for igniting the war. It also instigated the south Korean puppet army to commit armed provocations against the DPRK in the areas along the 38th parallel.
					
					Just before the start of the war the U.S. presidential envoy Dulles inspected the area south of the 38th parallel and told south Korean puppets: Attack north Korea along with the counter-propaganda that north Korea invaded south Korea first. If you hold out only for two weeks, the United States will complain that north Korea attacked south Korea, and see to it that the United Nations can mobilize ground, naval and air forces under its name.
					
					As planned and according to the gangster-like aggression policy of the U.S., the war against the DPRK was started on June 25, 1950.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Iron-willed Commander
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Iron-willed Commander
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- It was five years after Korea's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule or only two years since the birth of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea when the Korean War was unleashed by the U.S. on June 25, Juche 39 (1950).
					In defiance of the DPRK's warning on halt to the armed attack, the provokers went over to an overall war after passing through the 38th parallel at the dawn.
					
					The world was seized with worry over the DPRK's destiny.
					
					To cope with the war, President Kim Il Sung convened an extraordinary meeting of the DPRK Cabinet, at which he stressed the need to show the mettle of Koreans to the Americans taking them lightly.
					
					On the next day, he delivered a radio speech "Go All Out for Victory in the War" to all the Korean people and changed the Party and state affairs into a wartime system.
					
					In response to his order on going over to a counterattack, the Korean People's Army liberated Seoul City three days after the outbreak of the war and advanced southward.
					
					At that time, the President went to the forefront to command military operations.
					
					During the war he invented original war methods like subterranean position battle, aircraft-hunting and tank-hunting team movements and sniper team movement.
					
					Inspired by his command, KPA seamen sank a U.S. heavy cruiser with four torpedo boats in waters off Jumunjin. And a coast artillery company with four guns defended Wolmi Islet for three days from the attacks of more than 50,000 enemy troops with hundreds of warships and 1,000 odd warplanes.
					
					The Korean people's victory in the war, which started the U.S. imperialists on the downhill, was entirely attributable to the Juche-based military idea and superb commanding art of Kim Il Sung, an iron-willed brilliant commander and strategist.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Mocking World with Nukes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Mocking World with Nukes
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Short time ago, former Dutch Prime Minister Lubers said that 22 U.S. nuclear weapons have been deployed in his country. Opening to the public the exact location of the U.S. nuclear arsenal, the prime minister expressed his anguish, noting he has never thought of these stupid things staying there in 2013, too.
					Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					What Lubers said brings into bolder relief the fact that the U.S. is still deploying nukes in Europe.
					
					The U.S. moves to modernize nuclear weapons while mocking and deceiving the world are aimed to seek its strategy for world supremacy by dint of nukes, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The situation goes to prove that it is impossible to realize the world without nuclear weapons as long as the U.S. regards them as an effective means for world supremacy.
					
					In order to realize the dream of mankind to live in a safe world free from nuclear threat it is necessary for the U.S. to take the lead in the efforts for denuclearization as it possesses the biggest number of nuclear weapons, has the precedent of using them and poses biggest nuclear threat to humankind while brandishing a nuclear stick at will.
					
					The U.S. had better opt for denuclearization to meet the unanimous requirement of mankind, not practicing a black art with nukes.

articles.title: Papers Call for Foiling War Moves of U.S., Its Lackeys
articles.content:
Papers Call for Foiling War Moves of U.S., Its Lackeys
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Papers dedicate editorials to June 25, the day when the U.S. imperialists started the Korean war to invade the DPRK.
					Quite a long period has passed since the ceasefire, but the Korean nation has been exposed to constant danger of war posed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The U.S. has persistently pursued a hostile policy toward the DPRK and staged reckless war drills against it together with the puppet war-like forces of south Korea, far from drawing a lesson from its bitter defeat in the Korean war.
					
					In recent months the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime slapped "sanctions" against the DPRK and intensified joint military exercises to invade it, pulling it up over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and its steps for self-defense.
					
					The U.S. and the puppet regime remain unchanged in their sinister scenarios to bring down the independent DPRK and establish corrupt "liberal democracy" on the whole of Korea. They have sought to realize them from the start of the Korean war.
					
					The prevailing situation calls on all the Koreans to rise up in the patriotic actions to decisively smash the extremely dangerous moves of the U.S. and the south Korean trigger-happy elements for escalating confrontation with the DPRK and igniting the second Korean War, and safeguard the peace of the country and the security of the nation and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					The Korean Peninsula is the cradle for the Korean nation, and the peace on this land can be achieved only through a struggle.
					
					Minju Joson says that although the situation remains tense due to the escalated moves of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for confrontation and war, the army and the people of the DPRK are sure to win a final victory in the showdown with the U.S. as they are led by the great brilliant Songun commander Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Accused of Their Moves to Repeat History of Aggression
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Warmongers Accused of Their Moves to Repeat History of Aggression
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- It is 63 years since the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces provoked the Korean war to invade the DPRK.
					On this day Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article cites facts to prove that the Korean war was the most brutal and horrible war of aggression in history.
					
					Though gunfire ceased, the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces have persistently kicked up rackets to ignite a new war against the DPRK, the article says, and goes on:
					
					They have steadily escalated military confrontation and tensions on the Korean Peninsula and posed a grave danger of a nuclear war to the DPRK, waiting for a chance to ignite it for six decades, far from drawing a lesson from their shameful defeat in the Korean war. 
					
					This year alone, the U.S. and the puppet forces staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises and various other saber-rattling under the pretext of coping with "provocation" and "threat" from the DPRK.
					
					The danger of a nuclear war is increasing as the days go by on the Korean Peninsula as the U.S. and the puppet forces are working hard to invade the DPRK at any cost while antagonizing it.
					
					The DPRK's war deterrence for self-defence shows no mercy toward the aggressors, provocateurs, the article notes, warning those who seek confrontation and war will not be able to escape a miserable end and forlorn wandering spirit.

articles.title: Actions against IS Interference in Election Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against IS Interference in Election Unabated  in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The actions against the Intelligence Service's illegal interference in the election were staged in different parts of Seoul, according to CBS and MBC of south Korea. The actions were started with the publication of a declaration on the situation by the students.
					A youth organization on June 22 held a candlelight meeting denouncing the IS for its illegal interference in the election and demanded the arrest of Won Se Hun, former director of the IS, and urged the present chief executive to make an apology for it.
					
					The Federation of University Students has staged a candlelight demonstration denouncing the IS for its interference in the election and demanding a thorough investigation into the state administration at the Chonggye Plaza for the last four consecutive days since June 21.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Russia, Romania
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked in Russia, Romania
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Romanian Workers' Association from June 16 to 19 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il had displayed his organizing ability as an outstanding leader since his start of work at the C.C., WPK, adding:
					
					He wisely led the people to successfully make the Arduous March even under the adverse conditions where the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges became evermore undisguised after President Kim Il Sung passed away.
					
					The cause of the Korean revolution is reliably guaranteed as the dear respected Kim Jong Un has wisely led the country and its people to a rosy future.
					
					Speakers including the chairman of the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia praised Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into an invincible party which enjoys absolute support and trust of the people, deeply rooted among them. 
					
					Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said:
					
					Kim Jong Il performed undying ideological and theoretical feats by giving perfect answers to the complicated matters arising in the every period of the revolution and construction since his start of work at the C.C., WPK.
					
					The immortal exploits performed by him in the strengthening and development of the WPK and the world socialist movement will be always remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive humankind.
					
					We are convinced that the fraternal Korean people will build a powerful socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report at March Plenary Meeting of C.C., WPK Carried by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report at March Plenary Meeting of C.C., WPK Carried by Russian Newspaper
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Krasnoyarski Rabochi on June 20 carried the historic report made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					The report made by him on March 31, Juche 102 (2013) clarifies the new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the developing Korean revolution. It also indicates the tasks and ways for doing so.
					
					The paper carried his photo.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Kyrgyzstan
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Kyrgyzstan to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in Bishkek on June 20.
					A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of the anniversary.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported by Personages of India, Indonesia
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported by Personages of India, Indonesia
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A lecture and film shows were held by the Indian Working Women Society for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and an Indonesian company on June 14 and 17 to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including documentary introducing the Monument to the Three Charters for National Reunification.
					
					The president of the Indian Working Women Society for the Study of the Juche Philosophy in a lecture titled "Immortal banner of Korea's reunification" said:
					
					The idea of "By the Korean nation itself", the main spirit of the above-said declaration, is shining as an ever-lasting banner for Korea's reunification.
					
					This is because the idea of "By our Korean nation itself" is run through with the spirit of national independence, reflects the great national unity, a premise and fundamental way for reunification, and serves as the basic guarantee for protecting peace.
					
					Eye-opening events took place in the movement for Korea's reunification after the publication of the joint declaration.
					
					But the south Korean Lee Myung Bak's regime totally negated the declaration as soon as it took power, pushing the inter-Korean relations to acute confrontation.
					
					The present south Korean regime is chilling the desire of all the Koreans for reunification.
					
					To implement the joint declaration is the way of bringing earlier Korea's reunification.
					
					The director of an Indonesian company said the film show offered an opportunity to know better about the national power of the DPRK, adding:
					
					To support the joint declaration precisely means standing for reunification and to negate it means seeking division and war.
					
					The Korean people will certainly win victory in their efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for High-Level Talks with U.S. Hailed by French Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for High-Level Talks with U.S. Hailed by French Organization
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on June 16 supporting the important statement issued by the spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					Recalling that the NDC spokesman in the important statement proposed high-level talks with the U.S. in which both sides can sincerely discuss wide-ranging issues including easing military tensions, replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace mechanism and "building world without nuclear weapons" suggested by the U.S., the statement said:
					
					We welcome the proposal of the DPRK as we make efforts for the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. should not escalate tensions, shunning dialogue and negotiations, but positively respond to the proposal of the DPRK without delay.
					
					The Korean people and the international community are urging the U.S. to draw a due lesson from its responsibility for having pushed the situation on the peninsula to acute confrontation and the brink of war and to ensure peace and security in the region through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					The U.S. should bear in mind that the denuclearization and lasting peace on the peninsula can be achieved only through dialogue and negotiations.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue Supported by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue Supported by Peruvian Organization
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. should bear its due responsibility as the arch criminal who has steadily escalated the tensions on the Korean Peninsula for several decades and caused a nuclear crisis and respond to the DPRK's just proposal.
					The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted this in its statement on June 18 in support of the crucial statement issued by the spokesman for the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					
					The statement said:
					
					The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is not just aimed at making the "north dismantle its nukes" but at denuclearizing the whole peninsula including south Korea. It is the most thorough denuclearization aimed at putting a definite end to the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK in order to defuse the tensions on the Korean Peninsula and ensure peace in Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					It should no longer cling to sanctions against the DPRK designed to stifle it but stop all its moves of aggression against it.
					
					We fully support the crucial statement released by the spokesman for the NDC which clarified the most rational ways for denuclearization and detente on the peninsula.
					
					We extend full solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the sovereignty and reunification of the country and world peace.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Marked in Various Countries
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Book and photo exhibitions and a film show were held by the Socialist Party of Romania and the Indraprasta Public School in India and film shows by the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. the Orson Company and other companies of Indonesia from June 14 to 18.
					
					Displayed in the exhibitions were photos on exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in leading the WPK and the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Also displayed there were books including Kim Jong Il's works and pictures of Songun Korea.
					
					Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "The Monument to Party Founding" and "The Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang'".
					
					Speakers including the chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania praised the great exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in developing the WPK and accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un made sure that Kim Jong Il is held in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the WPK and is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					The principal of the Indraprasta Public School in India noted that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung into a mother party serving the popular masses after forming an integral whole with them and an ever-victorious party with invincible power.
					
					The president of the Indonesian Orson Company said that the Korean people would certainly build a thriving nation and achieve the country's independent and peaceful reunification of the country thanks to Kim Jong Un creditably carrying forward Kim Jong Il's cause.

articles.title: Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Marked by Regional Body
articles.content:
Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Marked by Regional Body
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted on its website an article titled "War deterrence decisively bolstered up by Comrade Kim Jong Un serves as guarantee for peaceful reunification" on June 15, the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					The article made a detailed account of the fact that the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a landmark of Korean reunification, was adopted 13 years ago, which opened up a fresh decisive phase in the reunification movement of the Korean nation.
					
					Noting that the south Korean Lee Myung Bak's regime totally negated the inter-Korean declarations and the inter-Korean relations have been extremely deteriorated by the present south Korean authorities, the article said:
					
					Support for the June 15 joint declaration just means reunification, whereas its denial means a war. It is undeniable truth.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un, in his New Year Address for 2013, underlined the need to defuse the confrontation between the north and the south, thoroughly implement the inter-Korean joint declarations and independently settle the reunification issue in the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					He provided the foundation and guarantee for the peaceful reunification by decisively bolstering up the war deterrence.
					
					The Korean nation is now waging a nation-wide movement to preserve the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and bring about a fresh era of peace, reunification and prosperity.
					
					The world community sincerely hopes that the Korean nation will achieve the national reunification at an early date and consolidate peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula in line with the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					If the present south Korean regime truly wants peace on the peninsula, it should show its will to implement the north-south joint declarations in practice.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Regional Body
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Regional Body
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo is sure to appear before long under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					The Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea noted this in its statement on June 14, a day before the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					Extending firm solidarity to the Korean people, the statement said:
					
					President Kim Il Sung devoted himself to the reunification of the country till the last moments of his life since its division.
					
					Thanks to leader Kim Jong Il who successfully carried forward his cause, the historic north-south joint declaration was adopted on June 15, 2000.
					
					The declaration opened up a road for inter-Korean reconciliation but the U.S. and its satellite forces have desperately moved to hinder its implementation.
					
					The U.S., in particular, is prodding south Korea into steadily ratcheting up tensions in a bid to keep its military bases in south Korea and tighten its control over the Far East and East Asian region.
					
					The world progressives are vehemently denouncing all the moves to block the implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, hoping that the Korean people would achieve the country's reunification as early as possible as desired by them.
					
					The Korean people are fully determined to invariably advance along the road chosen by them.
					
					No one can break their will to reunify the country.

articles.title: Vietnamese Internet Broadcasting Service Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Vietnamese Internet Broadcasting Service Introduces DPRK
Pyongyang, June 25 (KCNA) -- A Vietnamese internet broadcasting service on June 19 introduced the DPRK under the title "Enjoying a bird's-eye view of fresh modern buildings in Pyongyang".
					A lot of new modern buildings drawing attention of the international community were built in Pyongyang, capital city of the DPRK, the service said, and went on:
					
					The Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital is a modern comprehensive medical service and scientific research center which specializes in prevention and treatment of women's diseases including mastopathy and breast cancer.
					
					The institute has multi-purpose roentgen facility, ultra-modern CT and equipment for ultrasound diagnosis and electrocardiograph.
					
					It established telemedicine service system, in particular, to conduct regular medical examination of women throughout the country and early diagnosis and prevention of breast diseases.
					
					All the women are enjoying free medical care, receiving all the efficacious medicaments from the state. So they call this institute "Heaven of women".
					
					The service also introduced Ryugyong Health Complex, People's Open-air Ice Rink and Skate Park with photos.

articles.title: Rubricado acuerdo entre planteles docentes de Corea y China
articles.content:
Rubricado acuerdo entre planteles docentes de Corea y China
Beijing, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo firmado el dia 24 en esta capital el acuerdo sobre el hermanamiento entre el Instituto Superior de Arte Dramatico y Cinematografico de Pyongyang de Corea y el Instituto de Cinematografia de Beijing de China.
					El rector del instituto coreano y su homologo chino suscribieron el documento.

articles.title: Tiene lugar mitin antiyanqui de capitalinos
articles.content:
Tiene lugar mitin antiyanqui de capitalinos
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 25 de junio, dia de la lucha antiyanqui, tuvo lugar este martes en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de capitalinos. 
					Estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y el poder, entidades sociales, ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos, los compatriotas ultramarinos y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang. 
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea y otros huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					En el acto hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que con la malsana intencion de estrangular a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y realizar la ambicion de hegemonia mundial, el imperialismo norteamericano desato la guerra coreana, en la cual devasto lo todo del territorio coreano y cometio los crimenes de lesa humanidad nunca vistos en la historia de las guerras movilizando enormes fuerzas agresoras, el ejercito titere surcoreano y hasta las tropas de 15 paises satelites. 
					
					Pero, los yanquis no pudieron eludir la gran derrota vergonzosa ante el ejercito y pueblo coreanos levantados para defender honrosamente la libertad y la independencia de la patria, la soberania de la nacion y las conquistas de la revolucion bajo la destacada guia del Generalisimo Kim Il Sung, afirmaron. 
					
					Lejos de sacar la leccion en su derrota sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. amenaza gravemente la soberania y los maximos intereses de la RPDC recurriendo de siglo en siglo a la politica hostil y la campana belica contra esta, revelaron. 
					
					La historia y la realidad demuestran claramente que EE.UU. es el provocador de la guerra coreana, autor de todas las desgracias y sufrimientos de la nacion coreana y enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano, enfatizaron.
					
					Por ultimo, llamaron a todos a frustrar las imprudentes maniobras agresivas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana y lograr la victoria final en la confrontacion total antiyanqui y en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista. 
					
					Acto seguido, hubo una manifestacion antiyanqui.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae pasa revista a obras importantes de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae pasa revista a obras importantes de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 25 de junio (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, averiguo en el terreno como se construyen el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Club de Equitacion de Mirim y el Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu en esta capital. 
					Tras estimular a los constructores militares, Choe resalto la necesidad de proponerse la meta elevada para construir magnificamente todos los objetos acorde al proposito del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un y terminar esas obras lo mas pronto posible registrando grandes innovaciones y saltos. 
					
					Llamo a asegurar al maximo el nivel de construcciones y cumplir asi la mision del ejercito revolucionario de fomentar la felicidad del pueblo. 
					
					Se cercioro de las condiciones de vida de los militares y encomendo a todos los oficiales que atendieran bien a los soldados con el sentimiento fraternal.
